title: Accessories
content: Saving Throws Checks. Amulet of Misty Step Uncommon Misty StepLevel 2 Conjuration Spell Amulet of Restoration Rare Healing WordLevel 1 Evocation Spell Mass Healing WordLevel 3 Evocation Spell Amulet of Selûne's Chosen Uncommon Selûne's Dream: 1d8-1 hit points. A creature you touch regains 1d8-1 hit points, but potentially falls into a slumber. Amulet of Silvanus Uncommon Lesser Restoration: Remove one disease or condition afflicting a creature. Amulet of Windrider Very Rare Ride the WindLevel 3
